plays.text: Goal scored by Wade Belak assisted by Tomas Kaberle and Robert Svehla
Penalty to Brian Gionta 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Robert Reichel
Goal scored by Mats Sundin assisted by Robert Svehla and Tomas Kaberle
Goal scored by Jeff Friesen assisted by Scott Niedermayer and Jamie Langenbrunner
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Turner Stevenson
Penalty to Alexei Ponikarovsky 2 minutes for High Sticking Jamie Langenbrunner
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Tripping Grant Marshall
Goal scored by Jamie Langenbrunner assisted by Jeff Friesen and Brian Rafalski
Penalty to Robert Svehla 2 minutes for Holding Turner Stevenson
Penalty to Turner Stevenson 2 minutes for Slashing Ed Belfour
Penalty to Tie Domi 2 minutes for Roughing Jamie Langenbrunner
Penalty to Scott Gomez 2 minutes for High Sticking Tie Domi
Penalty to Nikolai Antropov 2 minutes for Interference Scott Stevens
Goal scored by Tomas Kaberle assisted by Robert Reichel and Jonas Hoglund
